jobDescription: Description In the ever-changing landscape of digital media advertising, paid social media is the front-runner of this evolution. In the past year, we’ve seen Facebook launch engagement retargeting capabilities, LinkedIn build Lead Generation ad units, Snap Inc. launch a self-serve advertising tool and Instagram start experimenting with paid ads within Stories. In the wake of all this, brands and businesses need guidance on how to effectively run a paid social media campaign. Enter, the Paid Social Media Manager.The Paid Social Media Manager will be responsible for understanding the intricacies and best practices for paid advertising on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram YouTube and Pinterest. He/She will build, launch, optimize and report on paid social media campaigns for a variety of different clients in both B2B and B2C sectors. Additionally, he/she will have the motivation to expand their knowledge into the broader scope of digital media advertising technology and strategy.
